name: Toddler Program
description: The Toddler Program's curriculum focuses on language development by using pictures, books and basic academics in their environment. Methods of following simple instructions is implemented through circle time, story time, art, and curriculum projects. Social and emotional development is developed with group playtime, motor skills through fun and sensory activities.
